name: TickleSim
description:
TickleSim is an interactive text-based tickling game. Think of it more as a story or a toy. 

There are two modes: Watching and tickling. In the tickle mode, you move through a story at your own pace by tickling a lee in different places. As you tickle them, you increase your score. When the score hits a certain threshold, you unlock a safeword scene. In watch mode, you just click through a story.

Please note that this is a demo - the full version will have significantly more content!
